results.title: Analysis of factors related to venous thrombosis after ankle fracture combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus applying tourniquet surgery.
results.text_hl: The objective was to study the risk factors of @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@venous thrombosis@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Ankle_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064386 @@@ankle fracture@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ surgery using a tourniquet and to assess the effect of ischemic preconditioning and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combination therapy in preventing @DISEASE_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang CG. Analysis of factors related to venous thrombosis after ankle fracture combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus applying tourniquet surgery. Medicine (Baltimore). 2024 Nov 22;103(47):e40296. PMID: 39809164
